name: Father's Secrets
description:
Father's Secrets

>-Dive deep into the short life story of 18 year old Maurice. The thruth about his dead father will scare you.  Enjoy the exclusive art that DennisByDEN. had made just for you!<3

>-After the death of his father, a man (boy?) decides to explore his house in hope to find out as much about the father who left him when he was still a young boy.

Can you help him solve puzzles to uncover all of his father's secrets?

If you love this game look up my other games on itch.io.

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email ( dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
